title: KDL Official Test Manifest
description: Specifies which KDL version each official test expects. Test names should NOT include the .kdl extension.

notes.description: This section contains documentation only and is not processed by the test runner
v1_features: Bare keywords: true, false, null, inf, -inf, nan (no # prefix)
test_categorization: v2_only: Tests that use v2-only features (underscores in numbers, multi-line strings)
v1_only: Tests that use bare keywords without # prefix
both: Tests that work identically in both v1 and v2
